title: Monday Mail: October 3
description: Your questions, answered. This episode, campaign reporter Scott Detrow, political editor Domenico Montanaro, and political reporter Danielle Kurtzleben. Find more coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
